item.title: VZ
item.description: score:-94 Chances: Verizon is set to announce its earnings report soon, with analysts expecting a likely earnings beat. Verizon’s Affordable Connectivity Program has helped nearly 23 million households access high-quality home internet without data caps, showing its commitment to providing reliable connectivity. Verizon Business’s innovative content delivery solution for NHL games demonstrates the company’s focus on co-innovation and leveraging 5G technology.

item.title: CCCS
item.description: score:84 Chances: CCC Intelligent Solutions Holdings Inc. has announced strong year-end financials with revenue and adjusted EBITDA surpassing guidance. The company’s cloud-based SaaS platform has the potential to connect companies across the P&C insurance economy and facilitate commerce. Enhanced data security feature for collision repairers on cccone.
